dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Miliaria germanica" and "Leucae horariae".
Shows topography, vegetation, drainage, territorial boundaries of the twelve tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Decorative title cartouche with illustrations of God, a holy man, angels, and the Ten Commandments.
